original_text: And rent the kingdom away from the house of David, and gave it thee: and yet thou hast not been as my servant David, who kept my commandments, and who followed me with all his heart, to do that only which was right in mine eyes;
korean_text: 나라를 다윗의 집에서 찢어내어 네게 주었거늘 너는 내 종 다윗이 내 명령을 지켜 전심으로 나를 따르며 나 보기에 정직한 일만 행하였음과 같지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: And rent the kingdom away from the house of David
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗 가문에서 왕국을 찢어 빼앗아

sentences.original_text: and yet thou hast not been as my servant David
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 나의 종 다윗과 같지 못했도다

sentences.original_text: and who followed me with all his heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 마음을 다해 나를 따랐느니라

sentences.original_text: to do that only which was right in mine eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 내 눈에 옳은 것만 행하였도다
